S

setActionListenerMode(int) - Method in class it.univr.GameOfLife.Griglia
This method sets the value into ActionListenerMode, used for adding or killing cells.
setCampo(Core) - Method in class it.univr.GameOfLife.Griglia
This method is used for setting the game field.
setColor() - Method in class it.univr.GameOfLife.Griglia
This method sets the color of the current grid, setting white on cells without life, blue for cells with life and red for dead cells.
setContGenLabel(String) - Method in class it.univr.GameOfLife.GameX
This method sets the generation counter in JLabel.
setDeath(boolean) - Method in class it.univr.GameOfLife.Cell
This method sets the death status of a cell.
setGridColor(int, Color) - Method in class it.univr.GameOfLife.Griglia
This method is used for setting the selected grid color.
setLife(boolean) - Method in class it.univr.GameOfLife.Cell
This method sets the life status of a cell.
setLifeFirstTrue(int, int) - Method in class it.univr.GameOfLife.Core
This method is used for setting cell's life to true, but in the real X and Y positions.
setNumOfThreadLabel(String) - Method in class it.univr.GameOfLife.GameX
This method sets the number of threads in the JLabel.
sleepFor(int) - Static method in class it.univr.GameOfLife.Finestra
This method is used for taking time on creating nextGen()
slider - Variable in class it.univr.GameOfLife.GameX
This instantiates the JSlider that will configure game speed.
start() - Method in class it.univr.GameOfLife.Finestra
Starting of game.
startFlag - Static variable in class it.univr.GameOfLife.Finestra
It's used for setting the status of the game.
